price: 54. (Abraham) respondió: «Ciertamente, vosotros y vuestros antepasadoshabéis estado en un claro extravío».
arabic: قَالَ لَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ أَنتُمۡ وَءَابَآؤُكُمۡ فِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla laqad kuntum antum waābāukum fī ḍalālin mubīnin
